alert.note: Alert for Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 20 at 8:59PM CDT until August 20 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following county, Winston. * WHEN...Until midnight CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 859 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Arley, Addison, Smith Lake, Falls City, Helicon, Nesmith, Cutoff Branch, Panther Branch, Mill Branch, Butler Branch, Little Dismal Creek, Devils Branch, Maple Branch, Hidden Cove Campground, Yellow Creek, Big Bear Branch, Little Bear Branch, Duncan Bridge, Bear Branch and Battle Branch.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
